name: Stichting Zeker-OnLine
membership: Zeker-OnLine is an independent organization, but has close connections with the Dutch Institute of IT Auditors (NOREA) , Erasmus University Rotterdam, and Royal Dutch Institute of registered Auditors (NBA) and ECP the Dutch Platform for Information Technology
goal: We are issuing Trust Certificates for Cloud Services to Cloud Service Providers based on Conformity Assessment method performed on a ISAE 3402 basis performed by registered auditors in the Dutch environment.
interests: Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: We are part of the Cloud Service Provider Certification stakeholder group of the EU and working towards a European Certification Scheme for Cloud Services (DG CNECT); Zeker-OnLine is a drafting member of this group.
